sentences.en: And it turns out he's a classmate of Philip's.
sentences.cn: 有意思的是他和Philip是同班同学.

sentences.en: Can you recommend a classmate who can take up the job?
sentences.cn: 你能不能推荐一位能承担这项工作的同学?

sentences.en: Chen Hong meets his former classmate Xie Hui on the bus.
sentences.cn: 陈虹在公共汽车上碰到了老同学谢辉.

sentences.en: Harry, this is my classmate Kate, and this is my friend Tim.
sentences.cn: 哈里, 这是我班同学凯特.这是我的朋友狄姆.

sentences.en: He acquainted his classmate with my sister.
sentences.cn: 他把我妹妹介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.en: He acquainted his classmate with my younger brother.
sentences.cn: 他把我的弟弟介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.en: He made a profession of friendship to his classmate Mary.
sentences.cn: 他向他的同学玛丽表白了他的友情.

sentences.en: He picked a fight with his classmate.
sentences.cn: 他和他的同学打了一架.

sentences.en: His classmate do not enjoy his company because he always backbite others.
sentences.cn: 他的同学不喜欢和他在一起,因为他老是在背后诽谤别人.

sentences.en: I bumped into an old classmate in the street.
sentences.cn: 我在街上碰到了一位老同学.

sentences.en: I recall: Which classmate have these initial consonant following in being surnamed?
sentences.cn: 我回想: 哪些同学的姓里有下面这些声母?

sentences.en: I, who am your classmate, can understand you.
sentences.cn: 我是你的同班同学,能了解你。

sentences.en: John and his classmate, Judy, rest during intervals.
sentences.cn: 约翰和他的同学朱迪在课间休息.

sentences.en: John is talking about his girl friend with his classmate, Bob.
sentences.cn: 约翰在向他的同学鲍勃谈论他的女朋友.

sentences.en: Mr. White: And it turns out he's a classmate of mine.
sentences.cn: 怀特: 有意思的是,他和我是同班同学.

sentences.en: My brother said his classmate Helen was as vain as a peacock.
sentences.cn: 我兄弟说他的同学海伦像孔雀一样虚荣.

sentences.en: We sympathized with our classmate whose mother was very ill.
sentences.cn: 我们十分同情那位母亲得了重病的同学.

sentences.en: When a test is being given, talking to a classmate is rude.
sentences.cn: 在测验时与同学交谈是不对的.

trans.tran_en: a member of the same class in a school, college or – in the US – a university
